descriptionHtml:
Makes [url=http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/Hroki_(Markarth)]Hroki (Markarth)[/url] tavern wench pretty by adding the new version of my [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15861/]Luscious Faces - Realistic female faces[/url] textures which have been completely rebuilt from scratch. She works at the [url=http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/Silver-Blood_Inn]Silver-Blood Inn[/url] in Markarth. Completely standalone and does not change anything other than Hroki.

[youtube]08j6goJI5VE[/youtube]
[color=green][b]Installation[/b][/color]

To install, unzip the file to the Skyrim Data folder or use Nexus Mod Manager (NMM). 

[color=green][b]Permissions[/b][/color]

See Permissions and Credits action button at the top of this page. Any customizations to all textures are not allowed without my permission.

[color=green][b]Credits[/b][/color]

Bethesda for the base femalehead.dds texture. 
Credit to the Blender team for creating a great tool. 
3d.sk for great textures.
author: dretmo
